author: Ivan Mehta
title: India is finally cracking down on the doxxing of coronavirus patients
description: As the number of coronavirus cases in India is rising, the country is trying hard to contain the outbreak through strict lockdown measures. Amid this situation, the Health Ministry issued an advisory yesterday asking not to share details of people who’ve test…
